name: ION-E Group
tag_list: software, web-development, web-design, content-management, search-engine-optimization, e-commerce, business-solutions, business-risk-services, sas-70-compliance, google-apps-integration, web-hosting, business-consulting, business-incubation
overview:
ION-E is a provider of innovative enterprise solutions and services to large and mid-size companies.

Our team consists of a diverse group of executive level individuals that possess the knowledge and experience necessary to implement our solutions.

We have offices in Newark, Delaware and Hamilton, Bermuda with sales and development offices from New York to Florida.

Our approach to a successful Technology strategy is based on delivering solutions that directly align with the goals and objectives of our customers.

  • Enterprise Risk Management
  • Business Process Development
  • IT Security
  • Application Development and Delivery
  • Regulatory and Compliance
  • Incidence Response
  • Technology Planning and Analysis
  • Website Strategy and Design
  • E-Commerce Solutions
  • Unified Communications Implementation and Support
  • Managed Services and Hosting

ION-E delivers value and simplification to the complex world of information technology.

We’re here to help you apply technology to address your specific business needs.
